name: Damsel
description: Cause distress in this challenging fast-paced action platformer. Experience a dark cartoon world come to life as frenetic gameplay meets comic book visuals and storytelling. Dash through beautiful arenas vanquishing vampires, rescuing hostages, disarming bombs, hacking servers and much more.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, Radeon HD 5670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5200, NVIDIA GeForce GT 750, Radeon HD 7800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
